User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user's profile and core identity within the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

email.description: User's primary email address, used for identification and communication.

avatarUrl.description: URL to the user's profile picture or avatar.

bio.description: A short biographical description provided by the user.

statusMessage.description: A user-defined message reflecting their current status or mood.

lastOnlineAt.description: Timestamp indicating the last time the user was actively online.

isAdmin.description: Boolean flag indicating if the user has administrative privileges within the application. This is used to grant admin dashboard access.

isBlocked.description: Boolean flag indicating if the user's account is currently blocked by an administrator for moderation purposes.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the user profile was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the user profile was last updated.

ContactFormSubmission.title: ContactFormSubmission
ContactFormSubmission.description: Stores messages submitted by users through a contact form, intended for administrator review.

id.description: Unique identifier for the contact form submission.

submitterId.description: Unique identifier of the user who submitted the form, if they were logged in. (Relationship: User 1:N ContactFormSubmission)

senderName.description: The name provided by the sender if they are not a logged-in user or wish to use a different name.

senderEmail.description: The email address provided by the sender for communication, especially if not a logged-in user.

subject.description: The subject line or topic of the contact form message.

message.description: The full content of the message submitted by the user.

submittedAt.description: Timestamp when the contact form was submitted.

status.description: The current status of the submission (e.g., 'New', 'In Progress', 'Resolved', 'Archived').

assignedToAdminId.description: Unique identifier of the admin user assigned to handle this submission. (Relationship: User 1:N ContactFormSubmission)

resolvedAt.description: Timestamp when the contact form submission was marked as resolved.

adminNotes.description: Internal notes added by administrators regarding the handling of this submission.

Community.title: Community
Community.description: Represents a server or community where users can interact in channels.

description.description: A brief description of the community.

ownerId.description: Unique identifier of the user who owns/created the community. (Relationship: User 1:N Community)

avatarUrl.description: URL to the community's icon or logo.

inviteCode.description: A unique, shareable code for inviting new members to the community.

isPublic.description: Boolean indicating if the community is publicly discoverable by other users.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the community was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the community was last updated.

Channel.title: Channel
Channel.description: Represents a channel within a Community where specific types of communication occur.

communityId.description: Unique identifier of the community this channel belongs to. (Relationship: Community 1:N Channel)

description.description: A brief description or topic for the channel.

isPrivate.description: Boolean indicating if the channel is private and requires specific permissions to access.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the channel was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the channel was last updated.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single chat message sent within a channel or direct message.

channelId.description: Unique identifier of the channel where the message was sent.

senderId.description: Unique identifier of the user who sent the message.

content.description: The textual content of the message.

sentAt.description: Timestamp when the message was sent.

disappearingEnabled.description: Whether the message is set to disappear.

disappearDuration.description: Duration in milliseconds before the message disappears after being viewed.

senderExpireAt.description: ISO timestamp for when the message expires for the sender.

viewerExpireAt.description: Map of user IDs to ISO timestamps for when the message expires for that specific viewer.

seenBy.description: List of user IDs who have seen the message.

deletedFor.description: List of user IDs for whom the message should no longer be visible.

fullyDeleted.description: Whether the message is completely deleted from all participants.

definition.description: Stores information for channels within a community.
Contains chat messages for a specific channel.
